hurry to it, fearing that the hunter will be wrapped.It was said: What is erected as a mark for the revelation of the king and his path.Abu Amran read the woven and a "stabbed" with the opening of the noun and the sterilizer, so he did in the sense of an effective, and read the good and the mourning of "a staple" by the guarantee of the sins of the "Nazbin" with two guilts or a group of two
